column2: can't believe it took me so long to come here considering how much closer this place is
column3: and this whole time I would travel to Killens BBQ for my Texas BBQ fix. Don't get me wrong
column4: I think Killens is still my favorite
column5: but this place is a close second
column6: and since the drive time is less than half
column7: I will definitely be coming back here more.
